name: Shooting Deer Range Short Gun
description:
Shooting Deer Range Short Gun: Training Shooting is the best action shooting game! Real gun shooting, the best military shooting training experience ever. Competition with the masters, according to field military training experience, which actually will help you win the game.
Features:
- Real field scene training
- The best operation
- Silhouette as the target shooting
- Aimed at the accuracy of training within the specified range
- Gun shooting master
- Aim at shooting
- Shoot with the highest precision
- Simulation shooter game.
